headline: The 5 Most Interesting Analyst Questions From Verizon’s Q3 Earnings Call
summary: Verizon’s third quarter saw a positive market reaction despite missing Wall Street’s revenue expectations, reflecting investor confidence in the company’s evolving strategy under new CEO Dan Schulman. Management attributed steady performance to increased upgrades in its consumer base, the expansion of converged offerings, and ongoing cost discipline. Schulman acknowledged that while Verizon’s network investments have built a strong foundation, customer growth has lagged. CFO Anthony Skiadas cred
